channel.title: I need your opinion on how this is looking so far :P
channel.description:
Ok well I went back to the drawing board, (you probebly saw one of my older sights, and you all thought it looked horrible) and came up with something new. Please give me contructive criticism on this and tell me could be fixed, touvhed up, edited, etc. All the images on the page are hand crafted (I used nothing but a cloud render and a paintbrush in Photoshop CS2) by ME and everything was hand made and thought up by me. You can see that it is not done yet. I still have yet to upload the web client and finish the server status and also upload the forums+Downloads pages. I want to make sure this looks good before I finish anything else to make sure I got it just right. Thanks for reading :P.
Website: [url=http://www.mattscape.ulmb.com]www.mattscape.ulmb.com[/url]

item.title: I need your opinion on how this is looking so far :P
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[quote=“Sync, post:17, topic:170917”][quote author=ThatOneServer link=topic=230896.msg1983668#msg1983668 date=1199733478]
ULMB SUCKS BLEH.
[/quote]Agreed, I hate their text editor.[/quote]

Yep. Their text editor is an epic fail, but if you’re not experienced with FTP, their file manager is really beneficial. It’s a shame about the popups etc though.
-JV

Read full topic

item.title: I need your opinion on how this is looking so far :P
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

If you’re asking for grammatical help as well, this

All new website graphics, hand crafted by the owner Matthew Arnold, himself!

should be

All new website graphics, hand crafted by the owner Matthew Arnold himself!

[hr]

And this

Ask Matt, the owner, himself! Email:

should be

Ask Matt, the owner himself! Email:

Just two things I noticed on the main page, there’s lots more in the create account section and a few more on the main page too, but those were the major ones that were bugging me.

Doesn’t matter if you change it or not, but IMO it looks much more professional on a website to use proper grammar, spelling, etc.

Read full topic

add this:

it tricks the browser into centering the banner

item.title: I need your opinion on how this is looking so far :P
item.dc:creator: @xX00java00Xx xX00java00Xx
item.description:
@xX00java00Xx wrote:

[quote=“kloplop321, post:2, topic:170917”]the playing page doesn’t work
the top box on the playing page does not contain links, so even when you are just showing, the user is forced to go use the “back” button[/quote]

Well i said it isn’t working yet cause I havn’t had the time to upload it yet. and I havn’t had time to do the links so thanks for the help and I’ll work at it :P. And I’ll take everything you said into mind. Thx

Read full topic
item.source: I need your opinion on how this is looking so far :P

item.title: I need your opinion on how this is looking so far :P
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

kinda bland, the bevel needs to be less “cheap” to say, and stuff.
Don’t make your email and server IP green, as it is hard to read like that.
change the server status text so it is bold
use PHP to remove the “PLAY” link when server is off line so that when players are going on and they are too hasty to notice the server is down.
the playing page doesn’t work
the top box on the playing page does not contain links, so even when you are just showing, the user is forced to go use the “back” button
the page is not properly centered
a border like on the left would be nice if there was one on the right, I’m sure javascript can handle that since CSS doesn’t support stuff like that I think, unless you make a div using CSS with a low Z-Level and the images floating right & left
put some decoration on the pages, like on the “Recent News” section, make it look more like paper(if that is what you are going toward), it also looks like a stretched 1 pixel tall image
make the “Play” and “Create account” buttons shorter

I think it would be nice if you had a Shout box on the left side under server status and your email, as it would fit just nicely there, you may also want to make it so that it uses accounts that the person makes through your site

I told you how it looks and some criticism, but I am not trying to put it down in ANY WAY

It may turn out quite good if you continue working at it.

Read full topic
item.source: I need your opinion on how this is looking so far :P
